text: A tarvata ma taraphu nundi vari vaddaku satyam vaccinapudu, varila annaru: "Musaku ivva badinatuvantidi, itaniki enduku ivvabadaledu!" Emi? Diniki purvam musaku ivvabadina danini varu tiraskarincaleda? Varannaru: "Rendu mayajalale! Avi okadani kokati sahayapadutunnayi." Inka ila annaru: "Niscayanga, memu vitannintini tiraskaristunnamu
